CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 5, 1956, pg. A2 reads: "Testimonial Banquet - Among the guests at the speaker's table at the testimonial banquet honoring Dr. Joseph A. Randall in Clairton Saturday night were, left to right: Mrs. Charles Bookert, Mayor Kenneth Stilley, W.P. Young, Dr. Randall, his wife, Mrs. Randall, and Gordon B. Hicks. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group at speakers table, from left: Mrs. Charles Bookert, Clairton Mayor Kenneth Stilley, W. P. Young, guest of honor Dr. Joseph A. Randall, Mrs. Joseph A. Randall, and Gordon B. Hicks, gathered at banquet table for testimonial dinner in interior with drawings of sporting events, Clairton
